org.jikesrvm.adaptive.measurements.instrumentation

Class CounterArrayManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jikesrvm.compilers.opt.InstrumentedEventCounterManager
      • org.jikesrvm.adaptive.measurements.instrumentation.CounterArrayManager

  • public final class CounterArrayManager
extends InstrumentedEventCounterManager
    An implementation of a InstrumentedEventCounterManager . It uses an unsynchronized two dimensional array of doubles to allocate its counters. (see InstrumentedEventCounterManager.java for a description of a counter manager)

    NOTE: Much of this class was stolen from CounterArray.java, which is now gone.

    • Method Detail

      • registerCounterSpace

        public int registerCounterSpace(int countersNeeded)
        This method is called by a ManagedCounterData object to obtain space in the counter manager. A handle or "ID" is returned for the data to identify its counter space.
        Specified by:
        registerCounterSpace in class InstrumentedEventCounterManager
        Parameters:
        countersNeeded - The number of counters being requested
        Returns:
        The handle for this data's counter space.

      • resizeCounterSpace

                               int countersNeeded)
        Description copied from class: InstrumentedEventCounterManager
        This method is called to change the number of counters needed.
        Specified by:
        resizeCounterSpace in class InstrumentedEventCounterManager
        Parameters:
        handle - The handle describing which the data to be resized
        countersNeeded - The number of counters needed

      • mutateOptEventCounterInstruction

        public void mutateOptEventCounterInstruction(Instruction counterInst,
                                             IR ir)
        Take an event counter instruction and mutate it into IR instructions that will do the actual counting. Precondition: IR is in LIR
        Specified by:
        mutateOptEventCounterInstruction in class InstrumentedEventCounterManager
        Parameters:
        counterInst - The counter instruction to mutate
        ir - The governing IR

                                         TypeReference type,

                                         int offset)
        Insert array load off before s in the instruction stream.
        Parameters:
        s - the instruction to insert before
        ir - the containing IR
        operator - the operator to insert
        type - the type of the result
        reg2 - the base to load from
        offset - the offset to load at
        Returns:

      • decay

        static void decay(int handle,
                  double rate)
        decay counters
        Parameters:
        handle - The identifier of the counter array to decay
        rate - The rate at which to decay, i.e. a value of 2 will divide all values in half
